title.narrative: (Voluntary Program) The voluntary medical campaign to combat blindness and the diseases that cause it

description.narrative: 1. Providing medical services to low-income beneficiaries who cannot cover the costs of their treatment 2. Performing surgeries 3. Providing patients with drugs, eyeglasses and lenses 4. Highlighting the humanitarian image of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia 5. Eliminate the suffering of many people who are blind 6. Health education for everyone receiving treatment 7. Aid to the Ministry of Health, which suffers from a lack of ophthalmologists
A voluntary medical campaign mainly aimed at performing surgeries to remove white water from the eye in addition to conducting an examination and dispensing of medical treatments and glasses
